main_text.sentence: Initial studies revealed that HIV-1 Vpr bound to the FG-rich region of several nucleoporins including the human p54 and p58 Nups, the rodent POM121, and the yeast NUP1P [71,73,74], but a direct interaction with the human CG1 nucleoporin was more recently reported [70].
Vpr interaction with nucleoporins has been reported before [20].
A polypeptide profile from purified rat liver NPCs revealed ~50 putative nucleoporins [3].
NPC corresponds to a 125-MDa structure consisting of 30 distinct nuclear pore proteins, named nucleoporins (Nups) [82].
These motifs typical for nucleoporins and have been shown to interact with components of the soluble transport machinery [3,9].
In the list of metazoan nucleoporins, there are only two integral membrane proteins, gp210 [4-6] and POM121 [7,8].

An integral membrane protein of the nuclear envelope contains a nucleoporin-like region
